mapper.select: SELECT CNO, CHAT_SEQ, SEND_USRNO, B.NICKNAME, B.FILEPATH, B.SYSNAME, CONTENT, SEND_DATE, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MSGRECEIVEUSER WHERE CNO = #{cno} AND CHAT_SEQ = #{chat_seq} AND READ_YN = 'N'),0) AS ISREAD, A.FILE_NO, C.FILEPATH as SENDFILEPATH, C.ORINAME as SENDORINAME, C.SYSNAME as SENDSYSNAME FROM CHATROOMDETAIL A, TBLUSERINFO B, TBLFILEBOARD C WHERE A.SEND_USRNO = B.USR_NO AND A.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO(+) AND A.CNO = #{cno} AND A.CHAT_SEQ = #{chat_seq}

SELECT CNO, CHAT_SEQ, SEND_USRNO, B.NICKNAME, B.FILEPATH, B.SYSNAME, CONTENT, SEND_DATE, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MSGRECEIVEUSER WHERE CNO = #{cno} AND CHAT_SEQ = A.CHAT_SEQ AND READ_YN = 'N'),0) AS ISREAD, A.FILE_NO, C.FILEPATH as SENDFILEPATH, C.ORINAME as SENDORINAME, C.SYSNAME as SENDSYSNAME FROM CHATROOMDETAIL A, TBLUSERINFO B, TBLFILEBOARD C WHERE A.SEND_USRNO = B.USR_NO AND A.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO(+) AND A.CNO = #{cno} ORDER BY CHAT_SEQ

SELECT T.*, U.NICKNAME, U.FILEPATH, U.SYSNAME FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.CNO ORDER BY A.CNO DESC) AS RNUM, A.CNO,B.CHAT_SEQ, A.ENTER_USRNO, A.USER_LIST,(CASE B.SEND_USRNO WHEN #{usrno} THEN C.USR_NO ELSE B.SEND_USRNO END) AS RECEIVE_USRNO, (CASE B.FILE_NO WHEN 0 THEN B.CONTENT ELSE '파일' END) AS CONTENT, B.SEND_DATE, NVL(D.CNT,0) AS READCNT, E.USRCNT FROM CHATROOM A, (SELECT F.* FROM CHATROOMDETAIL F, (SELECT CNO, MAX(CHAT_SEQ) AS CHAT_SEQ FROM CHATROOMDETAIL GROUP BY CNO) Y WHERE F.CNO = Y.CNO AND F.CHAT_SEQ = Y.CHAT_SEQ) B, MSGRECEIVEUSER C, (SELECT CNO, NVL(COUNT(CASE WHEN READ_YN = 'N' THEN 1 END),0) AS CNT FROM MSGRECEIVEUSER A WHERE USR_NO = #{usrno} GROUP BY CNO) D, (SELECT CNO, CHAT_SEQ, COUNT(USR_NO) AS USRCNT FROM MSGRECEIVEUSER GROUP BY CNO,CHAT_SEQ) E WHERE A.CNO = B.CNO AND B.CNO = C.CNO AND B.CHAT_SEQ = C.CHAT_SEQ AND B.CNO = D.CNO(+) AND B.CNO = E.CNO AND B.CHAT_SEQ = E.CHAT_SEQ AND USER_LIST LIKE '%' || #{usrno} || '%') T, TBLUSERINFO U WHERE T.RECEIVE_USRNO = U.USR_NO AND RNUM = 1 ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT CNO, CHAT_SEQ, SEND_USRNO, B.NICKNAME, B.FILEPATH, B.SYSNAME, CONTENT, SEND_DATE, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MSGRECEIVEUSER WHERE CNO = #{cno} AND CHAT_SEQ = #{chatSeq} AND READ_YN = 'N'),0) AS ISREAD, A.FILE_NO, C.FILEPATH as SENDFILEPATH, C.ORINAME as SENDORINAME, C.SYSNAME as SENDSYSNAME FROM CHATROOMDETAIL A, TBLUSERINFO B, TBLFILEBOARD C WHERE A.SEND_USRNO = B.USR_NO AND A.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO(+) AND A.CNO = #{cno} AND A.CHAT_SEQ = #{chatSeq}
